Title: One Last Grasp
Description:
We've looked everywhere he's likely to be, except for one place: the Violet Citadel.

Find out if Archmage Aethas is being held within the citadel, $n. We may get lucky. If not... at least we saved a number of lives today.
ObjectivesText: Slay Mage-Commander Zuros, then escape from Dalaran.
